description: Being cold is just as bad as overheating. This base layer top is made with temperature regulating fabric that disperses body heat to keep you comfortable during strenuous activity.Maetrx RedHEAT fibres manages body heat during high-output activities.Fabric has UPF 50+ sun protection and an antimicrobial finish.Anti-odour finish resists stink on long backcountry tours or multi-day backpacking adventures.Raglan sleeves allow full range of motion.Flatlock seams throughout for chafe-free wear.
name: Kombi RedHEAT Active Crew Top - Men's
